titleInfo.title: Discussion - Night Train to Nashville and The Beat tv show screening - 2004-05-22

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Panel discussion following the screening of two Nashville based TV shows titled Night Train to Nashville and The Beat!!! from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 22, 2004. In support of the exhibit "Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues".

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
